LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.label: Sintering Furnace
LanguageData.DMS_Furnace.description: A massive industrial furnace used to heat metals and minerals to a near liquid form to create advanced alloys. Can also be used to smelt metals.
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorCycleComplete.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorFormed.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechConstructorForming.label: Mote
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.label: Automatroid Constructor
LanguageData.DMS_MechGestatorSamll.description: A massive piece of industrial equipment used to assemble Automatroids.
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.label: Pressure Chamber
LanguageData.DMS_ReactionChamber.description: A massive industrial-grade vacuum chamber used to create a high-pressure environment to create mineral alloys.
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.label: Artifuscle Chamber
LanguageData.DMS_TableArtifuscle.description: High-end production equipment for cultivating Artifuscle and bionics.
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.label: Machinery Printer
LanguageData.DMS_TableMachinePrinter.description: A composite metal printer which can manufacture and assemble metal products and weapons through cold forging in order to mass-produce machinery.
